Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 48th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1976...
Earned first career win on 4/5/1983...
Injured on 9/21/1983 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit (triple) on 6/21/1986, off Lonnie Myhre (MAN)...
Released by Boston (FBA) on 4/7/1990...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 7/28/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $396,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/14/1991 to a 4-year deal worth $1,680,000 per year...
Injured on 4/13/1991 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
